page.title: 06A day in school in 1985
page.content: A normal day for J3 begins with K.M.P. Everyone does their own work from special Maths cards. Then there is assembly and the rest of the morning is spent doing Maths and English. There is a twenty minute break halfway through the morning. At 12.00 we stop for lunch then go out to play. Afternoon school begins at 1.15. Sometimes we have P.E., Art or a story. We also have environmental studies. At times during the year we go on educational visits. This year J3 went on visits to Greenwich Maritime Museum, Tenterden Steam Railway and bird watching at Rye Harbour Nature Reserve. We also took part in a musical event called Project Apollo.
